dcterms:description: A dataset containing budget items from the Japanese national diet, including identifiers, titles, URLs, budget amounts, categories, account types, departments, last year's budget, descriptions, and budget differences.
dcterms:title: PoliInfo3_BAM-budget.json

dcterms:description: A training dataset containing proceedings from local circumscriptions and national diet speeches, including a total of 1573 utterances and 1248 monetary expressions for training.
dcterms:title: PoliInfo3_BAM-minutes-training.json

dcterms:description: A test dataset structured similarly to the training data, containing 760 utterances from local circumscriptions and 123 speeches from the national diet, with 520 unlabelled monetary expressions for evaluation.
dcterms:title: PoliInfo3_BAM-minutes-test.json
